amendment.description: To require a report on cybersecurity education.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2216 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2216 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5096-5097) To require a report on cybersecurity education.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2216 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
